attributes.action: Help for adult vaccine victims of the Hepatitis B vaccination
attributes.additional_details:
Thousands of  public sector workers worldwide believe they have experienced serious adverse reactions to the Hepatitis B Vaccination. It is a requirement of their jobs to have this vaccination otherwise they cannot work.

Under current Government rules they are not entitled to any compensation from the outdated Vaccine Damage Compensation scheme, which is despicable given that their lives have been ruined through no fault of their own.

More than 150 MP’s have lent their support to demands for a better deal for these victims, yet nothing has been done to help them.

The Department of Health must investigate the reported serious side effects to this vaccine, review the current compensation system and help the victims suffering awful debilitating illnesses due to receiving the vaccination.
